wikipedia_page.main: Billy Little (born 3 February 1940) in Dumfries is a Scottish former professional association footballer and manager best known for his time at Aberdeen.

response: |Billy Little - Managerial Period & Record, bettermeddle.org.uk. Retrieved 28 June 2012.
William Little or Billy Little may refer to:
* Billy Little (1900s rugby league), English rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s
* Billy Little (rugby league, born 1911) (1911–2004), rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s for England, and Barrow
